@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency The issue here is that gravity sewers are not high pressure pipes. They are generally laid with ‘push fit’ fittings only capable of sustaining low pressure. Over time pipe joints fail allowing water ingress, particularly through areas of high water table or through streams.
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency 🙈🙉🙊

Last weeks #soil news if you missed it:  @EnvAgency on regulations, tree planting damaging peat, soils role in making good whisky, glyphosate causing soil erosion and water pollution & more! 🌱🥃

Keep up to date with our weekly blog, out every Friday am: https://t.co/6xDAE2KFfu https://t.co/JhNMtJBatt
